name: Regular Mozzarella
desc: Mozzarella is the one cheese pizza needs, and ours is made with 100% Canadian milk. It has a milky and buttery taste.

name: Daiya Dairy Free Mozzarella Style Shreds
desc: Certified vegan, GMO, dairy, gluten and soy-free, it melts, tastes and stretches much like regular mozzarella.
